sourcesWithTagButNotOnWiki: All Incursion Architects (The Temple of Atzoatl)
notes:
3.20: The Akil's Prophecy Divination Card has been re-enabled, and now awards a Double Corrupted Unique Elegant Round Shield. This card can now be found in the Temple of Atzoatl.
Is this an area drop or a monster drop?

See notes above; might be both `vaal_architect_incursion` and `vaal_architect_temple`.

3.21: Unless we find evidence of this occurring as an Area drop in the Temple of Atzoatl (as opposed to strictly dropping from Architects), this is probably `vaal_architect_temple` instead of `incursion_temple_area`.

Story Only? Former drop location was The Docks (Merciless).
Probably has Drop Level Cap
2022: Cartographer's Delight, significantly nerfed (was: ~Lantador's Lost Love ; now: ~The Witch)
3.20: Natural weight similar to The Dragon's Heart; likely Boss-specific though (since it hasn't been reported in any Area yet), and Boss-specific drops ignore natural weights

Can this occur from Architects outside of the Temple of Atzoatl, e.g. from Alva Memories or Incursions?

Akil's Prophecy is similar, and can in fact appear outside of the Temple of Atzoatl. See Akil's Prophecy notes above.

Divcord 3.19: Iron reports a drop from General Marceus Lioneye in a Map Legion Monolith, but the drop occurred while Lioneye was still in Stasis.

Datamining shows that Legion Generals (but not other Legion Monsters) do in fact have a special item drop eligibility override while in Stasis.

If this is the deterministic drop source of Rebirth and Renewal, either the hardcoded droprate is extremely low, or another condition needs to be met.

So far Iron's case is the sole report of Rebirth and Renewal despite lots of players running Legion. A drop from Legion is in-theme with the Card; when a Legion Monster leaves stasis, it's called "LegionRevive".

Divcord: 3.20, Zimzams documented a drop of The Emptiness from an explodey Mysterious Barrel in Maelstrom of Chaos
* Mysterious Barrels behave strangely, but the likelihood that a random Card would be The Emptiness is exceedingly slim.
* The drop may be unrelated to explodey Mysterious Barrels completely; those barrels do drop some natural DropPool items. It could simply be a natural Area drop in Maelstrom of Chaos. Its weight is so low that it's possible it simply hasn't been observed before.

If this were somehow a misleading generic drop, assuming solely natural weights, the probability of a coincidence is ~0.0000364.
(And Zimzams did not observed any other unexpected Cards from explodey Mysterious Barrels, so the real chance is even less.)

Divcord: 3.20, Jasmine found a drop in Maelstrom of Chaos from a non-Barrel source, though the Map did have explodey Mysterious Barrels. The Barrels themselves (or monsters within it) did not appear to drop any unusual cards, debunking the theory of random div cards other than possible reward conversion.
Seems like it's simply a natural Area drop in Maelstrom of Chaos. (The Card art looks like a maelstrom.)

To confirm, a positive result will be required from one of:
a) Maelstrom of Chaos, without Barrel sextant
b) Any non-Maelstrom map, with (explody) Barrel sextant

Shaper?

Divcord 3.22: Kenny obtains The Greatest Intentions from The Feared.
Unknown if this is specific to The Feared, or from one of the Bosses.

Historically dropped from Merciless Sawbones. All necromancer-type bosses do not appear to drop this card anymore - different tag?
necromancer_boss no longer appears to be the associated tag.

Breach Monsters, but which? All?
breach_commander ?

Also has been observed as Kirac Card Mission drops in: {Park, Marshes, Bazaar}. See Divcord. Jasmine: The Realm is likely added to the pool of possible cards in Kirac Missions. The card does not appear to drop in a single card - only in stacks. Kirac Missions can also pool boss cards, and is likely governed by unusual rules.

Appears to drop from any Breach Monster

Dvicord: 3.21, Elinvynia counted Active Skill Gems in Breachstones and proved that The Realm is a deterministic drop (not a natural drop).

Dropped from Park in a Kirac Mission as the stack of cards. Park has no area-specific cards. Perhaps another weird Kirac Mission mechanic?
Requires reconfirmation of Park Kirac Map or other tag-less maps
After more testing with Kirac missions - conclusion: dropping The Void from any source completes the mission; may not be Park specific.

In the past, The Wretched was eligible in Mud Geyser. The claim on the wiki is stale, however, and Mud Geyser has not been reverified in a long time. It's likely it is no longer an eligible Area.

Divcord 3.20: testing Bog which is on-Atlas and shares Tags with Mud Geyser (fetid_area, toxic_pool_area). No The Wretched in Bog, confidence >99.9%, so those Tags can't be it.

The only options are:
1) The Wretched no longer drops in Mud Geyser either; or
2) Mud Geyser's special exclusive Tag mud_geyser_area is another eligibility-grantor.
Also found in all Expedition Areas; any Tag or Area relationship for these...?

Uber Atziri was original report
Unverified from Incursion Atziri
T13 Maps? - disproved in T13 Volcano; might be drop capped to 80? unclear what Bex is referring to in her tweet
